text: Joe Knight Building, also known as Joe's Corner and Knight Drug Store, is a historic commercial building located at Lebanon, Laclede County, Missouri. It was built in 1948, and is a three-story, Streamline Moderne brick building with a flat roof. It features horizontal bands of windows and the curved corners are accented by large curved glass block walls. Dark bricks are also used to spell out "Joe Knight '48" and "Knight" on the main elevations. (includes 14 photographs from 2005) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2005. ==References== Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Modernist architecture in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1948 Category:Buildings and structures in Laclede County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Laclede County, Missouri Category:1948 establishments in Missouri
title: Joe Knight Building
